pages.text: These kind of concept cores are still semi-finished ones, which still need additional fillings to determine their work. Fill the content by the way of $(l:io_tools/interoperation_wand)Interoperation Wand$().
This concept core accepts any $(2)vanilla carpets and rails$(). Its work is based on the vanilla bug of carpet or rail duplication caused by high-speed reciprocating slime block.
This concept core accepts $(2)sand and gravel$(). Its work is based on the vanilla bug of falling block duplication caused by end portal.
This concept core accepts $(2)beetroot seed, carrot, potato and wheat seed$(). Its work is based on a vanilla villager farm.
This concept core accepts $(2)melon seed and pumpkin seed$(). Its work is based on a vanilla piston melon farm.
